roleset.name: to cause the ruin of
roleset.note: WRACK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wrack' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from wrack.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mutinies wrack his armed forces ( really just an armed gang ) , which [*T*-1] control less than half the country .
example.arg: his armed forces ( really just an armed gang ) , which [*T*-1] control less than half the country
